description.value:
Armor (Leather Armor) - Rare

While wearing this armor, you gain a +1 bonus to &reference[Armor Class].

Bonus Action

  • You can cause the armor to assume the appearance of a normal set of clothing or some other kind of armor. You decide what it looks like - including color, style, and accessories - but the armor retains its normal bulk and weight. The illusory appearance lasts until you use this property again or doff the armor.

unidentified.description:
Unidentified

This armor is unusually strong and well-crafted. It is most likely magic, though you can't identify the specific enchantment.

Leather armor consists of either layers of leather or a single thick layer of leather. The leather is hardened, often by boiling it in oil or coating it in a hardening compound. This armor usually only covers the torso, and provides more mobility than heavier armor, making it the choice for most archers or warriors who depend more on dodging and fast movement than tougher armor.
unidentified.name: Unidentified Glamoured Leather Armor
